title: Anyone wanna play? ;-;
body: I'm looking for new friends to play with. My real life friends aren't really hitting the spot for me and it's making me depressed how they tell me im so shit and everything else when they're the one feeding and raging. I just want to have fun with a couple of friends yoloing here and there or just straight forward hardcore team ranking for the lels. If anyones up for it friend me, if you're up for laughs and stuff :D

replies.body: {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} Hai I added you :) I've also got a league chat room called Well Played if you want to join and make some new friends and find others to play with were always looking for more positive players
